tweets.text: The environmental and humanitarian disaster in our town is even getting too much for the @EnvAgency call handlers yet still its being played down & no one has hit the major incident button!! How bad do you think it is for us @ClareDinnisEA ? #stopthestink https://t.co/ZboDkDhrUj

@GarethSimkins @SianieRoo @alan49479451 @a_rambling_man @BarristerSecret @JuliaBradbury @RedIndustries2 @Unchecked_UK @EnvAgency @TheENDSReport Looking forward to the truth emerging. It seems that our main hope is investigative reporting, what is happening to our town is scandalous.

@fayedavies @GarethSimkins @alan49479451 @a_rambling_man @BarristerSecret @JuliaBradbury @RedIndustries2 @Unchecked_UK @EnvAgency @TheENDSReport Yes it comes to something when the authorities &govt let you down this badly that there‚Äôs barely anywhere else to turn.We have to remember that despite being let down there are still people with a social and environmental conscience trying to help.I really really appreciate that

Can you smell this @AaronBell4NUL? 

I now have eyes burning, I cannot open my windows,it stinks throughout my property. 

Trying is not enough. This is a major incident. Where is is council evac plan?@EnvAgency seem to be making this WORSE with every change at the stink.

In the @AffinityWater application locations of the pumping stations were redacted. The @EnvAgency excuse ‚Äúcould compromise the security of public water supply assets‚Äù so building two HS2 tunnels through the aquifer does not compromise the security of public water supply??

@tayz_BETH @stopthestink 'store in neutral conditions away from extreme heat or cold' how do these IPC's comply @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids?
Should this not be another breach to add to their ever growing collection?
If these do contain liquids doesn't this breach COSHH @H_S_E

#StopTheStink https://t.co/JGOyxrnOKJ

tweets.text: We‚Äôve listened to the @EnvAgency explanations & pacifications re why they won‚Äôt curtail waste ops (apparently unlawful-not sure how this can be when they continue to breach their own odour mgt plan). If a cooking pot is boiling over you don‚Äôt add more food into it #stopthestink

Woken to blocked nose, wheezy chest, sticky eyes. Am I sick ? Yes, sick to death of @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids  @PHE_WestMids allowing this suffering and more. The Walleys Landfill is a 3rd world  health/ env emergency @DrMariaNeira @WHO @DefraGovUK @ClareDinnisEA #StopTheStink

@OneFactorial @JuliaBradbury @WalleysL @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency We feel like we are being slowly poisoned to death, frequently feeling ill& terrified for our health after an eminent paediatrician in the area bravely spoke out on the local radio about concerns over long term lung development #stopthestink

@Warren_A_Smith @sunnydayz_66 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids please do some core drilling and chemical analysis of them to see what has been dumped recently and in the past and cross reference with records of what should have been dumped

A community in Staffordshire are living with doors & windows taped up.Nose bleeds, breathing issues, toxic fumes from the landfill site @WalleysL run by @RedIndustries2  The @EnvAgency have found the company  'in breach' but v little action #socialjustice  https://t.co/DehURqq0oi

July 2019 @AffinityWater concerned about the damage & pollution HS2 work to the aquifer they applied to @EnvAgency to move abstraction volumes from their impacted Blackford pumping station to the Grove, a location which was less at threat. The @EnvAgency have just approved this.

So sorry to hear about this at Silverdale, Stoke On Trent. Constant rotting smells ruin lives. Remember doing a story years ago about the ‚ÄòPenrith Pong‚Äô in Cumbria. Good luck with your campaign üëçüåü‚ù§Ô∏è#StopTheStink https://t.co/oO0eUlmCKx

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency This is a National disgrace and a local emergency at the landfill site in Silverdale. EA wake up please the tip is out of control and causing untold pain and long term effects. People are on the edge of doing actions outside of their normal characters. We are being gassed. !!!

Not only did the  @EnvAgency say the landfill is not behaving as they would expect it to with the measures they also have no idea why the gas is so strong& there are health harms 4.6miles away - why are alarm bells not ringing about this out of control landfill? #stopthestink https://t.co/EAig4u5Skt
